ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp

Class TagList

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp.TagList

  • public class TagList
extends Object
    Stores a list of tags (as an ArrayList) along with a set of listeners to be updated whenever the list is modified. Will eventually provide an interface to a TagListManager which will save the list to disk and the web when connected.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(Listener listener)
      Add a new listener to be updated whenever the tagList is changed.
      ArrayList<Tag> getTags()
      Returns the stored tagList.
      void removeListener(Listener listener)
      Remove a listener so that it will no longer be updated when the tagList is changed.
      void saveTagList()
      Save the stored tagList to disk/the web server (not yet implemented).
      void setTagList(ArrayList<Tag> tagList)
      Set the stored tagList, will automatically update listeners and save the list once saving is implemented.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
